events.title: Scheduled maintenance on Lagos–Abeokuta 132kV line
events.description: The Transmission Company of Nigeria will conduct maintenance on the Lagos–Abeokuta 132kV transmission line. Customers on affected feeders may experience supply interruptions while crews replace protective relays and re-string conductors.

events.title: Fault on Ikeja West 33kV feeder
events.description: Ikeja Electric reports a fault on the Ikeja West 33kV feeder affecting Alimosho, Shasha, and Egbeda districts. Technicians are isolating the faulted section to restore supply to unaffected customers.

events.title: Restoration update for Zaria axis
events.description: Kaduna Electric confirms that supply has been restored to the Zaria axis after emergency repairs on the 33kV feeder. Customers should report any persisting outage via the contact centre.
